title: FDP Crosses Above Key Moving Average Level - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Fresh Del Monte Produce Inc. (Symbol: FDP) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $28.37, changing hands as high as $28.76 per share. Fresh Del Monte Produce Inc. shares are currently trading up about 4.3% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of FDP shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
